name: Twilight of the Gods
uniques: All newly-trained [All] units [in all cities] receive the [Sons of the Aesir] promotion
Can be purchased for [0] [Faith] [in all cities] <hidden from users>
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your Ally for [1] turns
Cities are razed [10] times as fast
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Destroyed when the city is captured
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles
Enables conversion of city production to [Culture]
Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
Enables conversion of city production to [Science]
Enemy [All] units must spend [3] extra movement points when inside your territory
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+100]% more Influence
Influence of all other civilizations with all city-states degrades [100]% faster
May buy [All] buildings for [0] [Faith] [in all cities]
May buy [All] units for [0] [Faith] [in all cities]
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [10000] XP
Moves to new capital when capital changes
New [All] units start with [10000] Experience [in all cities]
No damage penalty for wounded units
Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [1000]
Unavailable <in cities with a [Glory of the Aesir]> <hidden from users>
Unavailable <in cities with a [True Asgarheim]> <hidden from users>
When defeating a [All] unit, earn [100] Gold and recruit it
